name: Celebrate or Die
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 27 with Godot Engine. It took like 10 hours max, as I had not that much time.

You have to control Jammy to find Godot at the top, somewhere. You can celebrate if you will to pause the platforms for a while.

F5: reload
CTRL: celebrate!

This game is not easy. I mean, really.
